title: Justin Timberlake is given a run for his money by son Silas on family outing with Jessica Biel in LA
text:
Justin Timberlake was given a run for his money by young son Silas on Tuesday.

The singer, 38, was snapped racing after the four-year-old at a LA park where the youngster took part in baseball practice.

Silas's mom Jessica Biel was also there along with her mother Kimberly Biel.

Doting dad: Justin Timberlake, 38, was given a run for his money by son Silas, 4, as they enjoyed an outing to a LA park on Tuesday where the youngster had baseball practice

Justin, 38, and Jessica, 37, keep their family life private so it was a rare glimpse into their life together with their only child.

The former NSYNC boybander and the actress tied the knot in 2012 and welcomed Silas in 2015.

Justin was dressed for the outing in a Nike shirt, shorts and trainers and donned a dark blue baseball cap.

Silas was kitted out in a t-shirt and short with black Velcro sneakers.

Family: Silas's mom Jessica Biel, 37, was also there along with her mother Kimberly Biel. The former NSYNC boybander and the actress tied the knot in 2012 and welcomed Silas in 2015

Jessica was on trend in ripped faded blue jeans which she paired with a gray tee,

She added a long cream cardigan and two-tone trainers.

Her long hair was straight and loose and she accessorized with a couple of gold necklaces and a pair of round sunglasses.

Jessica currently stars in the Facebook Watch series Limetown.

Funny: Last Friday, the celebrity couple attended the Casamigos Halloween party where Jessica dressed up as her husband in his boyband heyday and Justin dressed as a microphone

Last Friday night, the celebrity couple were among the famous guests at the annual Casamigos Halloween party which this year was held at the Beverly Hills home of the tequila brand's co-founder Mike Meldman.

They showed their sense of humor with Jessica arriving dressed as her husband in his boyband heyday while Justin dressed as a microphone.

Jessica wore a metallic baggy jumpsuit with tiny blue sunglasses in a nod to Justin's 1999 NSync look and donned a tight curly blonde wig.

The pop star had on a long black tunic and a huge black orb on his head with an 'on-off' switch around his neck.
description: Justin, 38, and Jessica, 37, keep their family life private so it was a rare glimpse into their life together with their only child.
